document.full_text: the united states will aim to destroy al qaeda's central organization now that its leader osama bin laden has been killed and its capabilities degraded by u.s. operations, a top white house adviser said on tuesday.
document.title: u.s. believes it can now destroy al qaeda
lines_and_colors: the united states will aim to destroy al qaeda's central organization now that its leader osama bin laden has been killed and its capabilities degraded by u.s. operations, a top white house adviser said on tuesday.
